name: Probot GPG
description: A GitHub App that enforces GPG signatures on Pull Requests

PRIVATE_KEY.description: the private key you downloaded when creating the GitHub App

APP_ID.description: the ID of your GitHub App

WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: the secret configured for your GitHub App

SENTRY_DSN.description: the Sentry Data Source Name (DSN) used to configure the Sentry SDK

LOG_LEVEL.description: the lowest level of log output to display (trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal)

LOG_FORMAT.description: how Probot core log output should be formatted (simple, short, long, bunyan, json, inspect)
